Mulong Luo was born in Wuhan, China. He got his B.S. degree (honored) in Microeletronics at Peking University n 2014, M.S. in Computer Science at University of California San Diego in 2017. He is currently pursuing a Ph.D. degree in computer engineering at Cornell University, advised by Prof. G. Edward Suh. His research interests include computer architecture and computer security, with an emphasize the applications in cyber-physical systems and autonomous driving.
